series_description: Documents monthly assignment and adjustments of assignments of producer base to licensed processing distributors.
Documents information concerning licensed distributors. File includes applications, correspondence and other materials.
retention_statement: Retain 3 years after end of last licensing period; then destro
Retain 3 years after being revoked, suspended, canceled, close of case review, or legal action.

series_title: Equalization Fund Files - Standard Records the calculation of payments to and from the Equalization Fund. Includes worksheets, reports and correspondence.
retention_statement: Retain 3 years or after audit, whichever is longer; then destroy.

series_title: Equalization Fund Files - With Pending Legal Action Records the calculation of payments to and from the Equalization Fund. Includes worksheets, reports and correspondence. These files may have legal action, such as bankruptcy proceedings, pending.
retention_statement: Retain 3 years after closure of legal action; then destroy.

series_description: Documents public hearing procedures through transcripts, evidence, notices and commission action.
Documents administration of Producer Recovery Fund actions by the Commission through various financial records.
retention_statement: Retain 3 years after final payout of funds; then destroy.

series_description: Documents regulatory actions conducted through Administrative Process Act. II. AUDIT AND COMPLIANCE
retention_statement: Retain 5 years after expiration or when superceded; then destroy.

series_title: Audit of Reports of Receipts and Utilization and Compliance Files - Standard
series_description: Documents audit findings on original distributor monthly reports of receipts and utilization. Includes worksheet, correspondence and documentary evidence.
retention_statement: Retain 3 years or after audit, whichever is longer; then destroy.

series_title: Audit of Reports of Receipts and Utilization and Compliance Files - Undergoing Commission or Legal Action
series_description: Documents audit findings on original distributor monthly reports of receipts and utilization. Includes worksheet, correspondence and documentary evidence.
retention_statement: Retain 3 years after closure of case review or legal action then destroy.

series_title: Cost Studies and Related Files - Undergoing Commission or Legal Action
series_description: Documents individual study and analysis of the processing costs of selected milk processing plants. Includes cost records, worksheets, reports and correspondence.
retention_statement: Retain 3 years after closure of case review or legal action then destroy.

series_title: Investigations and Fair Trade Matters - Standard
series_description: Documents investigations and other Fair Trade issues involving compliance to SMC Rules and Regulations.

series_title: Investigations and Fair Trade Matters - Undergoing Commission or Legal Action
series_description: Documents investigations and other Fair Trade issues involving compliance to SMC Rules and Regulations.
retention_statement: Retain 3 years after closure of case review or legal action then destroy.

series_description: Documents monthly filings of distributor reports of Receipts and
retention_statement: Retain 2 years or after audit, whichever is longer; then destroy.

series_title: Monthly Reports of Receipts and Utilization- Undergoing Commission or Legal Action
series_description: Documents monthly filings of distributor reports of Receipts and III. PRODUCER ACCOUNTING
retention_statement: Retain 3 years after closure of case review or legal action then destroy.

Documents monthly milk production of producers.
Documents production and base information relative to licensed base-holding milk producers and non-base-holding producers.
